flawed_nl_solution:
Rachel has 1500 - 135 - 141 envelopes = <<1500-135-141=2124>>2124 envelopes remaining to stuff.
Rachel has 8 hours - 2 hours = <<8-2=6>>6 hours left to finish the task.
Rachel needs to stuff 2124 envelopes / 6 hours = <<2124/6=354>>354 envelopes per hour.
#### 354

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1224, not 2124. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
